name: Data Count (1 hour gamejam)
description:
Foresee if the buffer will hold all data.
Made in 1 hour for Weekly Hour Game Jam - W22 2017
Theme: 0x00 BUFFER OVERFLOW

Controls: Mouse or touch.

Follow me on itch.io and Twitter (@rogertygames) to keep in touch and let me know in the comments what you think of this game.
